As a yeoman in Boston, she

1696.03.text:

1703.44.text:
She has been a professor

1705.97.text:

1712.01.text:

1715.21.text:

1719.15.text:

1726.36.text:
So, Olivia, you're

1728.66.text:
She's still as sharp as

1739.84.text:

1776.10.text:
So Dr. Hooker has led

1779.34.text:
But this is what she says --

1784.82.text:
It's about what we can

1791.16.text:
Cadets, you're at the

1795.99.text:
And we cannot

1798.03.text:

1800.43.text:

1817.48.text:
the biggest difference for

1827.59.text:

1830.96.text:

1839.50.text:

1842.14.text:

1854.12.text:

1859.16.text:

1861.19.text:

1870.50.text:

1878.94.text:

1882.55.text:

1886.78.text:

1899.13.text:
